description: The <0>Model Context Protocol</0> enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Shenma's capabilities. You can use <1>community-made servers</1> or ask Shenma to create new tools specific to your workflow (e.g., "add a tool that gets the latest npm docs").

enableToggle.description: When enabled, Shenma will be able to interact with MCP servers for advanced functionality. If you're not using MCP, you can disable this to reduce Shenma's token usage.

enableServerCreation.description: When enabled, Shenma can help you create new MCP servers via commands like "add a new tool to...". If you don't need to create MCP servers you can disable this to reduce Shenma's token usage.
